Articles.Content:
A parkour add-on would require intimate understanding of the [Kerbal joint/bone hierarchy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113748-Reference-Kerbal-EVA-model-transform-tree), and a large library of various limb animations.

AFAIK, there's little understanding of the API required to alter/replace the default Kerbal animations or the logic used to determine when/how to perform a parkour action.
